tag.name: var
tag.description: the default layout for the views. Defaults to '//layouts/column2', meaning using two-column layout. See 'protected/views/layouts/column2.php'.

docblock.long-description: This method is used by the 'accessControl' filter.

tag.name: param
tag.description: the ID of the model to be displayed

docblock.long-description: If creation is successful, the browser will be redirected to the 'view' page.
If update is successful, the browser will be redirected to the 'view' page.

tag.name: param
tag.description: the ID of the model to be updated

docblock.long-description: If deletion is successful, the browser will be redirected to the 'admin' page.

tag.name: param
tag.description: the ID of the model to be deleted

docblock.description: Returns the data model based on the primary key given in the GET variable.
docblock.long-description: If the data model is not found, an HTTP exception will be raised.

tag.name: param
tag.description: the ID of the model to be loaded

docblock.description: Prüft ob das Kind zum User gehört.

docblock.description: This is the default 'index' action that is invoked when an action is not explicitly requested by users.
This is the action to handle external exceptions.
Logs out the current user and redirect to homepage.
